title: FS: T206 - PSA graded - Sovereign & Old Mill

posts.post_title: FS: T206 - PSA graded - Sovereign & Old Mill
posts.post_content:
I have the following three cards available.

1) Art Devlin, Sovereign 150, PSA 1 - multiple creases - $22 SOLD
2) Lou Fiene (Throwing), Old Mill, PSA 3 - light crease on front that doesn't break through - $55
3) Steamer Flanagan, Old Mill, PSA 4.5 - nice - $90 SOLD

Send e-mail to sschris at att dot net to request scans.  (I'm unable to attach scans to this post right now.)  Please be patient with responses, I will get back to you.

Thanks for looking.

Steve
Steve- email sent about the Devlin.
